reviews.name: Grandma Jean
reviews.review: I just love these, I can hear crystal clear. My confidence has been restored.

reviews.name: Bob Johnson
reviews.review: These discreet hearing aids are unnoticeable. I can talk with my grandchildren and friends without having to have them talk into my ear.

reviews.name: Gwnyne Kinghtly
reviews.review: I bought these for my husband, because he was denying his hearing was bad. He has thanked me for getting these for him and he is back to his normal lifestyle.

reviews.name: Mark Brown
reviews.review: Wow, these work great! I'm so surprised with the crisp sounds I can hear with no ringing or disruptive background noise
